summary.para: Retrieves the view size preference of the application after the application has launched.

param.name: sourceSizeAfterLaunch
param.para: Contains the address of a pointer to an .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the position of the source application window.

param.name: hwnd
param.para: Contains the address of a pointer to a window handle.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides methods for retrieving information about the source application.
